description:
Double outfit options and fuzzy warmth for cold mornings awaiting the school bus or shoulder season camp weekends. The reversible design lets kids choose the water-resistant shell when it's drizzly or a fleecy look when it's dry. Cozy synthetic insulation and 1/4 inch pile fleece lock in body heat, and handwarmer pockets on both the inside and the outside keeps hands warm when the temperatures drop.

  • Recycled polyester shell with a DWR (durable water repellent) finish to keep it water-resistant
  • Deep-pile recycled polyester fleece is soft and cozy
  • 60g Thermolite® ECO92 recycled polyester insulation for reliable warmth
  • Baffled construction holds insulation in place
  • Insulated hood has soft elastic binding
  • Cuffs and hem has elasting binding to seal out drafts
  • Handwarmer pockets on both sides. Fleece side has zippered chest pocket
name: Patagonia Reversible Ready Freddy Hoody - Youths
